title: IcaroAugusto
author: IcaroAugusto
content: RECSTREAMS.COM AUTOMATIC AIO STREAM RECORDERRecStreams is a cross platform desktop application that can record streams from multiple websites. You only have to feed it the url where you watch the stream and the program does the rest. You can record just the current stream or set it to monitor and automatically record all future streams. The free version is limited to 1 minute video duration and will only record a single time when monitoring.https://i.ibb.co/LtJyZCt/recstreams.webpFeaturesCan record from multiple websitesEasy to use: just grab the stream's url and add to the programMonitor feature: Automatically records all future streamsCross platform: Windows, Mac and Linux3 video formats available: mp4, ts and mkvCan record as many streams as you need, limited only by your internet speed and computer specs.Supported websitesHere is a list with all supported websites: https://recstreams.com/Supported/DownloadsYou can download it here: https://recstreams.com/Downloads/PurchaseYou can either subscribe or buy a single key.If you wish to change your current subscription, cancel it first then subscribe again on the new mode.Credit card, Paypal and Bitcoin payments are supported.$50 USD - 1 Year$25 USD - 3 Months$10 USD - 1 Month.You can purchase it here: https://recstreams.com/Purchase/ContactYou can contact me on telegram: https://telegram.me/Icaro10100
